original_definition: 'digital photo frame' means an electronic display that displays exclusively still visual information;
generated_definition: 'digital photo frames' means a digital photo frame is a device that displays digital images stored on a memory card or a connected computer. it is typically used to display a slideshow of images or to display a single image at a time.
